items.details: Premium seafood pizza loaded with mouth-watering baby scallops, crab kani, basil strips and parsley flakes.
A medley of Quorn Chicken style chunks, onions, bell peppers, Cheddar cheese, and cheese sauce.
Indulge in Quorn chicken style chunks, Quorn Pepperoni style pieces, black olives, bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and pineapple
Tasty chicken barbeque, red onions, rick smokey barbeque sauce, cheddar cheese, drizzled with fresh cilanto pesto, thin crust
Beef, Italian sausage, pepperoni, ham, salami, cheddar cheese, salami bits, mushrooms, red and green bell pepper, onions and black olives
